game.template.elements

Class SunFlower

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.template.elements.SunProducer
      • game.template.elements.SunFlower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card, Images

    public class SunFlower
extends SunProducer
implements Card, Images
    This class controls the time of showing card of sunFlower and showing it. Also manages producing sun by sunFlower. Sets sunFlower images.
